Email_1.Body:
This is not good at all. We are now under the
    public eye because of that asshole! But, it
    doesn't really matter all that much anyways 
    since the public is not even interested in the
    idea of privacy. We have given up on the idea
    of privacy many years ago.
            
    Well, should we get onto the next one?
            
    Your next assignment is ready in the Graph
    application.
